Prizes of the 24th piano contest (January 2009)

The great First Prize will have the opportunity to :
  • give a piano recital in the Ecole Polytechnique in December 2009

First Prize
  • A bouquet of flowers offered by the florist "Au Jardin des Fées", Palaiseau
  • A Jeroboam of champagne Brut Impérial Moët & Chandon
  • A season ticket for the Salle Pleyel, Paris
  • All the Beethoven concerti by Radu Lupu, Decca
Second prize
  • A Magnum of champagne Brut Impérial Moët & Chandon
  • Beethoven, André Boucourechliev, Ed. du Seuil, Collection Solfège
  • A ticket for a concert in the Salle Pleyel, Paris
Third prize
  • A Magnum of champagne Brut Impérial Moët & Chandon
  • A ticket for a concert in the Salle Pleyel, Paris
Public prize
  • A traditional object of the Ecole Polytechnique
